Dependencies:
  * libsdl1.2-dev
  * libsdl-net1.2-dev
  * libsdl-ttf2.0-dev
  * libsdl-image1.2-dev
  * libsdl1.2-dev
  * libsdl1.2-dev
  * libsqlite3-dev

To download, compile and install on linux, open a terminal and run the following sequence of commands:
{{{
sudo aptitude update
sudo aptitude install build-essential \
   libsdl1.2-dev \
   libsdl-net1.2-dev \
   libsdl-ttf2.0-dev \
   libsdl-image1.2-dev \
   libsqlite3-dev

cd ~/Desktop
svn checkout http://libamanita.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ libamanita
cd libamanita

./autogen.sh
./configure
make
sudo make install

cd ..
rm -r libamanita
}}}

For windows users, it's the same principles, if you install MinGW and MSYS, and you will have to install the dependencies manually. You can find everything you need here:
 http://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files
